question: Which country is to host men’s Hockey World Cup in 2023?
explanation: India will host the Men’s Hockey World Cup for the second consecutive time after the country was picked to host the game’s showpiece event in 2023 by the International Hockey Federation. The Men’s Hockey World Cup will be held in India from January 13 to 29, 2023. Spain and the Netherlands were named as the co-hosts of the 2022 Women’s World Cup scheduled to be held from July 1 to 22, 2022.
